mistral_input/experiment_stories1.csv:
1. As a user, I want the app to have a scrolling feature that works properly and does not cause text to overlap.
2. As a user, I want the app to have efficient battery usage to ensure it does not drain the battery quickly.
3. As a user, I want the app to have an intuitive like animation.
4. As a user, I want to understand the purpose of the app.
5. As a user, I want the app to be free from spyware and not to circumvent firewalls.
6. As a user, I want the app to respect user privacy and not ban accounts for using a username as a real name.
7. As a user, I want the ability to search hashtags and cashtags.
8. As a user, I want the app to have strong security to prevent hacking.
9. As an Android user, I want to be able to upload pictures to the app.
10. As an Android user, I want the app to allow me to go to a specific folder in the gallery app when uploading a picture.
11. As an Android user, I want the option to save images from the app.
12. As a user, I want the ability to download pictures from the app.
13. As a user, I want a following only feed.
14. As a user, I want an integrated DM system with messenger and Instagram DMs.
15. As a user, I want a better followers and following system.
16. As a user, I want a solution for the issue where words stick together and everything sticks together.
17. As a user, I want the app interface to not make me feel dizzy.
18. As a user, I want the app to be free from bugs.
19. As a user, I want the app to not become bloatware like Instagram.
20. As a user, I want the app to not cause my screen to act weird or flicker when I log in.
21. As a user, I want the scrolling speed to be faster.
22. As a user, I want the screen refresh rate to be higher.
23. As a user, I want the keyboard not to cover my message when I'm typing.
24. As a user, I want the ability to change my username.
25. As a user, I want the option to delete my Threads account without deleting my Instagram account.

llama_input/experiment_stories1.csv:
1. Users should be able to scroll through the app without rendering issues.
2. Users should be able to open the app without causing a battery drain.
3. Users should be able to upload pictures and videos smoothly.
4. The app's interface should be intuitive and easy to navigate.
5. The app's material design should match Android standards.
6. Users should be able to access specific folders in their gallery app.
7. Users should be able to download pictures from the app on Android.
8. Users should be able to customize their feed (e.g., following-only feed, DM system).
9. The app should display text without overlapping.
10. The app should have a stable refresh rate to support smooth screen scrolling.
11. The app should not cover the keyboard while typing.
12. Users should be able to see what they're typing while typing.
13. Users should be able to easily rename their user account without affecting linked accounts.
14. Users should be able to delete their account independently without affecting linked accounts.
15. The app should not crash or close unexpectedly for no reason.
16. The app should handle user accounts and profile management securely.

Here are the minimal set of user stories that capture all the requirements expressed in these reviews:

1. The app should render content without overlap and allow for smooth scrolling in various situations.

2. The app should not consume excessive battery life and provide users with clear battery information in their device settings.

3. The app should have an intuitive design and user experience, avoiding irrelevant or unclear animations and features.

4. The app should respect users' anonymity and maintain secure, prevent potential hacking into user accounts.

5. The app should provide features such as hashtag search and hashtag hashtag caching functionality so users can quickly search for and access content related to their interests.

6. The user interface of the app should work similarly across different platforms (iOS and Android), with all functionalities consistent everywhere.

7. The app should be able to upload and download images to and from a user's existing picture galleries. The functionality to upload and download images should work as well as on twitter and support device dependent operations efficiently.

8. Users should be able to search and find other users from within the android device using advanced search options with location-based services and hashtags filtering enabled by default.

9. An incorporated feed, built to help the users only see the posts from their selected group of individuals only or persons you may following on other apps which you are interested in or else on following and an enhanced profile related interaction tool.
10. Fix: Words should not stick together on the app interface to enhance a single-page or tab experience with single-task operations for a better end user satisfaction and interaction without distraction for such unnecessary operation execution in user applications
11. Fix: Application refresh should not make a user's operating device go over or hang during login to make it more comfortable, seamless user experience using latest standards rather making hang often. 
12. The app should have better functionality such as better page load performance enhancements while switching quickly from post replies with quick search options and reduced lags, 
13. Quick read & scanable screen should allow us to have faster refresh rates when moving or switching rapidly across and search new updates including updates that get newly added, to make more efficiency using best UI.

14. Maintain simple interaction layout so the app provides clear keyboard layout and provide necessary messages display so as the messages without unnecessary disruption after posting any information within the application.
15. Remove user limitation by incorporating account deleting securely (keeping cross-linked data), letting users easily change their names securely as they desire on all new available fields such that no restriction, more accessible features, and free decision.
16. Proper integration so bug such that caused my user name cover by some kind of strange keyboard not available, due to previous accidental merge but for easy deleting purpose allow for more security and efficiency while adding no bugs using standard framework before further making successful development in long-term for new features.

1. As a user, I want to scroll through content without the text overlapping or collapsing so that I can read posts clearly.
2. As a user, I want the app to consume minimal battery power so that my device remains usable for other tasks throughout the day.
3. As a user, I want a more intuitive like animation to enhance my experience using the app.

6. As a user, I want the ability to navigate to specific folders in my gallery when uploading media on Android, similar to the iOS experience.
7. As a user, I want the option to save images directly from the app to have my content available offline.
8. As a user, I want to have a following-only feed to filter content based on my preferences.
9. As a user, I want to have a Direct Messaging system integrated with other messaging platforms for better communication.
10. As a user, I want a more efficient followers and following management system to easily manage my connections.
11. As a user, I want to read posts without the text sticking together or causing visual issues for better readability.
12. As a user, I want the user interface to not cause dizziness, ensuring a comfortable experience while using the app.
13. As a user, I want the app to have fewer bugs than its predecessor, Instagram, for smoother performance.
14. As a user, I want to search for users without the app closing unexpectedly, ensuring reliability in navigation.
15. As a user, I want the screen scrolling speed to be fast and responsive for a better browsing experience.
16. As a user, I want to see what I am typing when composing messages to prevent frustration during communication.
17. As a user, I want the flexibility to change my username without being tied to another account in the process.
18. As a user, I want the ability to delete my Threads account independently without being forced to delete my Instagram account.

- As a user, I want the app to render properly while scrolling, so that text does not overlap and I can read content clearly.
- As a user, I want the app to be optimized for battery usage, so that it does not drain my battery quickly while using it.
- As a user, I want intuitive animations and design, so that I can easily understand how to use the app without confusion.
- As a user, I want a proper search function for hashtags and cashtags, so that I can find content easily.
- As a user, I want to be able to upload pictures to the app reliably, without the app crashing during the process.
- As a user, I want to be able to access specific folders within my gallery app when uploading media on Android, similar to the functionality available on iOS.
- As a user, I want an option to save images within the app, similar to how it works on Twitter.
- As a user, I want features like a "following only" feed and an integrated DM system with Messenger and Instagram DMs, to enhance my experience using the app.
- As a user, I want a better followers and following management system to improve my connection with others.
- As a user, I want the app interface to be less dizzying and more user-friendly, to avoid discomfort while using it.
- As a user, I want to eliminate bugs that cause the app to flicker or show weird behavior, so that I can use the app without interruptions.
- As a user, I want the scrolling speed and screen refresh rate to be improved for better performance compared to other apps.
- As a user, I want the keyboard to not obstruct my view while typing, so that I can see what I'm writing.
- As a user, I want the ability to change my username and manage my account independently, without linking it to my Instagram account.

llama_input/experiment_stories2.csv:
1. Users should not be redirected to their phone when trying to download on a tablet. 
2. Allow posts to exceed character limits without crashing.
3. Provide an option to toggle the hidden badges feature.
4. Accept creation of new accounts without requiring an Instagram account.
5. Filter the feed to show only accounts or content from accounts that the user follows.
6. Implement a trending page feature.
7. Allow pinch to zoom in videos and download them.
8. Add a separate account creation feature for Threads.
9. Provide a collaborative feature where users can share a space to talk and share ideas.
10. Unbloat the feed to prioritize content from followed accounts.
11. Fix issues with photo uploads and responsiveness to push notifications.
12. Improve video player functionality.
13. Provide the option to personalize the looks and layout of the app.

1. As a user, I want to be able to download the app on multiple devices and sign in to each device without it automatically switching to my phone's account.
2. As a user, I want to be able to make posts, including uploading videos, without the app freezing or timing out.
3. As a user, I want to be able to reinstate hidden badges on the app when available.
4. As a user, I want to be able to create a new account without already having an Instagram account to sign in.
5. As a user, I want to see content on my feed that only includes posts from accounts I follow, with an option to toggle this setting if possible.
6. As a user, I want to have access to more complex features, including but not limited to:
    a. Edit Thread
    b. Translate Thread
    c. Ability to pin Threads
    d. Better Feed page
    e. Video player optimization
    f. Working hashtags
    g. Trending page
7. As a user, I want to see fewer irrelevant posts and more content that aligns with my interests.
8. As a user, I want to be able to collaborate with other users in real-time through a shared space.
9. As a user, I want to be able to have an option to create a separate account for Threads, independent of my Instagram account.
10. As a user, I want to be able to initiate and have a private chat with any user I want.
11. As a user, I want videos and audio to play smoothly in the app, without issues like not being able to hear audio while watching video.
12. As a user, I want my home feed to only include content from verified accounts and people I follow.
13. As a user, I want the replies section to open seamlessly when getting push notifications.
14. As a user, I want to be able to post pictures and videos successfully, without the app crashing or freezing.
15. As a user, I want to see my username when posting a tweet from my account that is shared by accounts I follow on Instagram.
16. As a user, I want to see people I follow and are of interest to me on my feed instead of irrelevant accounts.
17. As a user, I want to be able to log in and keep both my Instagram and Threads accounts active and signed in without them automatically logging out of each other.
18. As a user, I want to have better functionality with photos and images, including:
    a. Being able to zoom in on pictures without autoresetting
    b. Having size and quality settings for images
    c. Having the option to download images
19. As a user, I want to be able to have multiple accounts logged in at the same time, similar to how the Instagram app handles this feature.
20. As a user, I want to have UI customization options for the app, including but not limited to:
    a. Themes
    b. Custom colors for the app
    c. Headers for our accounts

1. As a user, I want to be able to download the app on my tablet so that I can use it on multiple devices.
2. As a user, I want to troubleshoot posting issues that occur after the initial days of use, so that I can consistently make posts without problems.

4. As a user, I want the option to create a Threads account without requiring an Instagram account, so that I can use the app independently.
5. As a user, I want to find interesting content on my feed, as the current content is not engaging for me.
6. As a user, I want complex features such as Edit Thread, Translate Thread, Ability to pin Threads, and a trending page, so that I have more functionality within the app.
7. As a user, I want to filter my feed to only show posts from accounts I follow, so that my feed is relevant to my interests.
8. As a user, I want a collaborative feature for talking and sharing ideas with other users, so that I can engage more meaningfully within the app.
9. As a user, I want to have an option to chat personally with other users, so that I can communicate directly with them.
10. As a user, I want the video player to function correctly with sound, so that I can enjoy videos without issues.
11. As a user, I want to see content from accounts I follow rather than verified accounts I do not follow, to ensure my feed is personalized.
12. As a user, I want the app to resolve glitches when opening the replies section via push notifications, so I can access replies reliably.
13. As a user, I want to troubleshoot posting pictures without the app crashing, so that I can share images seamlessly.
14. As a user, I want to avoid automatic logouts between Threads and Instagram, ensuring a smoother user experience across both apps.
15. As a user, I want the app to improve its functionality with photos and images, including zoom and download options, for better multimedia experiences.
16. As a user, I want the ability to log in to multiple accounts like I can on Instagram, and have UI customization options to personalize my experience.
